prod_short_desc: Start your engine and race through the dunes!
prod_long_desc:
Get behind the wheel and take on the desert with the super-fast LEGO® City Buggy. This tough vehicle features an opening roll cage over the seat, huge chunky tires and a big engine at the back. Includes a minifigure.
Includes a Buggy driver minifigure.
Features an opening roll cage, huge chunky tires and a big engine.
Seat the driver and get ready to ride the dunes!
This set offers an age-appropriate build and play experience for ages 5-12.
Buggy measures over 2” high, 4” long and 2” wide.
